record.name: SLO Response Edit (4b)

init.expressions.init.expressions: if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("affected.item", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("affected.item", str(condition in $L.file))+26;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.affected.item=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("contact.name", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("contact.name", str(condition in $L.file))+25;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.contact.name=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("dept", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("dept", str(condition in $L.file))+17;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.dept=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("company", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("company", str(condition in $L.file))+20;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.company=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("location", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("location", str(condition in $L.file))+21;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.location=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("critical.device", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($begin=index("critical.device", str(condition in $L.file))+27;if substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, 1)#"t" then ($slo.critical.device=true) else ($slo.critical.device=false))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("critical.user", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($begin=index("critical.user", str(condition in $L.file))+25;if substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, 1)#"t" then ($slo.critical.user=true) else ($slo.critical.user=false))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("severity", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("severity", str(condition in $L.file))+21;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.severity=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("category", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($stop=false;$begin=index("category", str(condition in $L.file))+21;$lng=lng(str(condition in $L.file))+1;for $i = $begin to $lng do (if ($stop=false and substr(str(condition in $L.file), $i, 1)="\"") then ($stop=true;$end=$i));$slo.category=substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, $end - $begin))

if (created.from.wiz in $L.file=true and index("total.loss", str(condition in $L.file))>0) then ($begin=index("total.loss", str(condition in $L.file))+22;if substr(str(condition in $L.file), $begin, 1)#"t" then ($slo.total.loss=true) else ($slo.total.loss=false))

record.title: scmsg(8,"slo")
record.window.title: scmsg(14,"slo")

comments.comments: This wizard is used to walk a user through editing an existing Response SLO (Service Level Objective) or adding a copy of an existing SLO (cloning).

record.brief.description: Edit Response SLO (Service Desk Condition Filters)
